relationships.description: Jeffrey asking about who will represent Acosta at hearings

analysis.purpose: To inform Jeffrey Epstein about representation arrangements for Acosta at hearings, including potential Trump administration aide assistance

notable_quotes: He will be by himself. Perhaps a trump administration aide to assist and accompany him.
Who will represent Acosta at hearings
